While Mr. David Cameron was quick to issue a statement supporting Mr. Andy Coulson Friday, arguing that his ex-aide has been punished twice for the same offence, the tabloid scandal has tainted his government with two less than desirable associations. He then moved to the outside, going 4-for-8 from 3-point range. He got a couple of easy ones, and once you get a couple of layups, the basket looks bigger, said Allen Iverson , who had 28 points.`` He played a great game, and hopefully he can continue to play that way.'' As for honoring a convicted felon, Dwaine Caraway said,`` I care deeply about animals'' and`` am deeply sorry to offend anyone who loves animals.'' He acknowledged Michael Vick 's past but noted that since making some bad choices, Michael Vick has devoted time to speaking to children about staying in school staying away from drugs, making positive choices about picking friends and the importance of education. That was the focus of the event. Mayor Tom Leppert said he has asked the city manager to`` propose guidelines to prevent this situation in the future. Four Dispatches investigation( presented by that notable Labour stooge, Peter Oborne ), a former senior NoW journalist revealed that Andy Coulson had personally listened to intercepted voicemail messages. He told the programme: Sometimes, they would say:` We've got a recording' and Andy Coulson would say:` OK, bring it into my office and play it to me' or` Bring me, email me a transcript of it.' warns Social Security may be on Franklin Roosevelt chopping block, a US Barack Obama recently told Raw Story, expressing deep uneasiness about Barack Obama 's noncommittal attitude toward staving off cuts to the cherished program. I have to tell you, I have been on the phone to the very, very, very highest levels of the Barack Obama administration, and the responses that I am getting are not assuring, Sen. Bernie Sanders ( I-VT) said in an exclusive interview.`` What I'm told is that no definitive decisions have been made on the issue of Social Security- I expect that is probably true.''

Tonight at the Grammy's David Letterman presented what he called the Top 10 Surprises at the 2011 Grammy Awards. No. 10:`` Lindsay Lohan seen leaving the Staples Center with a Grammy-shaped bulge,'' No. 9:`` New music laws prohibit rhyming ladies with Mercedes.''* JUSTIN BIEBER
